Hero.heroText: is a trusted car service app connecting vehicle owners with reliable service providers. We offer a wide range of automotive services, including maintenance & repairs, Spare parts, insurance, and more!. With FIXAWI, you can easily find, book, and manage all your car care needs through a convenient, user-friendly platform focused on quality and convenience.

S1.title: Service Centers Map
S1.content: Locate and book top-rated service centers nearby, categorized by type (mechanics, tire shops, etc.). Filter based on service type, ratings, and price points to find the best option for your needs. With customer reviews and ratings, you can make informed decisions about where to get your car serviced.

S2.title: Insurance Services
S2.content: Easily renew or issue new car insurance policies through our integrated insurance broker service. Fixawi partners with reputable insurance providers to offer competitive rates. We also simplify the claims process by handling communication between service centers and insurance companies.

S3.title: Emergency Assistance (WINCH)
S3.content: For major breakdowns, Fixawi’s 24/7 winch service will tow your vehicle to the nearest service center. We partner with trusted winch providers to ensure fast, reliable assistance, no matter where you are.

S4.title: Store to Door
S4.content: Need a part or accessory for your vehicle? Fixawi’s store-to-door service delivers car parts and accessories right to your doorstep. Browse our catalog, place an order, and have your items delivered hassle-free.

Soon.title: Portable Car Maintenance
Soon.content: Convenient Service, Anytime, Anywhere, Fixawi’s fleet of equipped vehicles provides on-spot services such as tire changes, battery replacements, and minor repairs. Use the app to schedule a service and track the technician’s arrival in real time. All technicians are certified to guarantee quality.

1.title: Ease of booking
1.content: Book car services with unparalleled ease, using Fixawi.

2.title: Convenience
2.content: Fixawi handles all your car maintenance needs in one app.

3.title: Peace of Mind
3.content: With Fixawi focus on enjoying your drive, without stress.

4.title: Quality
4.content: Fixawi provides expert services that meet high standards.

5.title: Availability
5.content: Easy booking and 24/7 service access with Fixawi.

6.title: Transparency
6.content: Fixawi offers clear, upfront pricing with no surprises.

1.title: Our Mission
1.content: Our mission is to revolutionize the car service industry by providing seamless, reliable, and efficient solutions for vehicle owners everywhere. We aim to build long-lasting relationships with our customers through exceptional service, transparency, and trust.

2.title: Our Vision
2.content: Our vision is to be the leading global platform for car services, known for our innovation, customer-centric approach, and commitment to sustainability. We envision a world where car maintenance and repair are hassle-free, giving vehicle owners peace of mind and more time to enjoy the journey.

HowToUse.heading: How to use
HowToUse.title: Do it in just 3 simple steps

steps.1: Choose the services you want and find out their prices.
steps.2: Choose a convenient date and time
steps.3: Enjoy hassle-free car services in record time, a step away.

DropANote.title: Drop a note
DropANote.summary: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have suggestions, questions, or just want to drop us a note, your feedback is invaluable. Help us make Fixawi even better by sharing your thoughts. Don't hesitate—your opinion truly matters to us!
DropANote.subject: Subject

Footer.paragraph: Fixawi is a private owned company focused on simplifying car Services for owners. We ensure vehicles are kept in excellent condition, offering convenient and flexible services in terms of time and location at competitive prices.
